Interests

Apart from being a web developer and software engineer, I love to play and make music. I play guitar, piano, and sing.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi movies and television shows, and listen to my vinyl collection (The Beatles and Queen, of course). I spend the rest of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the tech and software development world.
